channel.title: Wagneric: Ghost in the Machine [fortississimo ambient]
channel.description: [This](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180611-199608-gitm) is the second track in an experiment to find out what happens when I nudge myself in a diatonic/tonal direction. Thanks to @anon86704580 for the perspective.

item.title: Wagneric: Ghost in the Machine [fortississimo ambient]
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.source: Wagneric: Ghost in the Machine [fortississimo ambient]

item.title: Wagneric: Ghost in the Machine [fortississimo ambient]
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
NickElle:

Some stuff sounds outta key.

Yeah, my musical language is not for everyone. This track was a fun attempt to scale back my polytonalist tendencies and meet conventional tonality half-way after being called “not melodically correct”, so it’s about as “normal” as I can manage to sound while still being true to my inner voice. Thank you for listening, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Wagneric: Ghost in the Machine [fortississimo ambient]
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
This is epic! Not just the saying, but literally. You didn’t have to do this because I recommended it, but I appreciate you doing it! Sounds awesome, almost like a fantasy vibe to it.

Versatility: 9/10
Creativity: 9/10
Predictability: 8/10
Use of Instruments/Automation: 10/10
Feeling: 9/10

Overall: 45/50
